timeline.message:
Implement Track.Id and Waypoint.Id (without tests).
Fixes #276.

timeline.bodyText: Isn't that dangerous? Will the debugger crash, when you look at an Id variable?
timeline.author: pstorch

replies.bodyText:
The debugger survives (at least in AndroidStudio) and will just to a toString on the exception.
We can remove this afterwards; I just wanted to make sure that we never use toString in old context (aka "Something" + trackId) and get unexpected/weird results.
replies.author: dennisguse

timeline.message:
Implement Track.Id and Waypoint.Id (with tests).
Fixes #276.

Implement Track.Id and Waypoint.Id (with tests).
Fixes #276.
